news.title: Google's decade-long bet on custom chips is turning into company's secret weapon in AI race
news.summary: Google's cloud business is a primary engine of growth. The company's custom-built chips called Tensor Processing Units are helping drive it.

news.title: Tesla says shareholders approve Musk's $1 trillion pay plan with over 75% voting in favor
news.summary: Tesla shareholders approved CEO Elon Musk's historic pay package at the company's annual shareholders meeting in Austin, Texas. Musk's pay package is worth an estimated $20 billion.

news.title: Ford reportedly considers ending production of all-electric F-150 Lightning
news.summary: Ford is considering ending production of its all-electric F-150 Lightning pickup truck. The decision comes amid mounting losses and challenging market conditions for EVs.

news.title: Peloton posts bullish holiday forecast, betting that shoppers will spend big on new product lineup
news.summary: Peloton beat Wall Street's expectations on the top and bottom lines. The company also issued strong holiday guidance. Peloton is based in New York and has more than 1 million employees.

news.title: Sam Altman says OpenAI will top $20 billion in annualized revenue this year, hundreds of billions by 2030
news.summary: OpenAI has inked more than $1.4 trillion of infrastructure deals. The company is raising questions about how it will pay for those commitments.

news.title: Where next for Big Tech stocks? Pay attention to bitcoin, says Citi.
news.summary: The crypto is closely correlated with the Nasdaq. The Nasdaq is the world's largest stock exchange. The crypto is also closely correlated to the U.S. stock market.

news.title: This viral visualization of AI-driven job destruction might actually be ‘the stupidest chart in the world’
news.summary: A viral chart that has been bouncing around social-media platforms like X over the past few weeks has caught the attention of investing professionals and amateur observers alike.

news.title: Trade wars are dying down, but the U.S. economy is still licking its wounds
news.summary: The trade wars have died down, but they have not disappeared. That has left a cloud over the U.S. economy that is unlikely to go away soon.

news.title: Meta’s stock is the new ‘Magnificent Seven’ doormat. Should you buy the dip?
news.summary: Shares of Facebook have slumped 17% since the company signaled aggressive AI spending ahead. While some are concerned, others see a prime buying opportunity.

news.title: Gold has a shot at $5,000 if investors rekindle this popular trade
news.summary: It has been more than two weeks since gold prices notched record highs. The debasement trade that has played a key role in the precious metal’s rally this year is alive and well.
